TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaExpansionBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制惯性运动期间大小调整操作的减速度。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a resizing manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定展开操作在惯性时的行为方式。The class specifies how a expansion manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用 事件中的属性 执行以下操作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 通过设置属性来指定惯性开始时的初始速度 。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定惯性结束时所需的操作扩展 。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置属性，指定所需的惯性减速度 。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 设置 或 ，但不能同时设置两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 设置其中一个属性后，如果另一个属性具有值，则其他属性将更改为 。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). ## Examples 下面的示例显示了 事件处理程序，并为惯性期间使用的转换、扩展和旋转设置了所需的减速度。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 本示例摘自 [演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 获取或设置大小调整速度慢于与设备无关的单位，每个单位) 每平方英寸 (1/96th 每英寸。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate that resizing slows in device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) per square milliseconds.

value.span: 大小调整速度慢于与设备无关的单位，每个单位) 每平方英寸 (1/96th 每英寸。

span.span: The rate that resizing slows in device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) per square milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定惯性所需的减速。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 设置 或 ，但不能同时设置两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 设置其中一个属性后，如果另一个属性具有值，则其他属性将更改为 。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅 [演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.
